EmailTemplate.subject: Uncover advanced solutions with our interactive Healthcare eJournal
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Office Depot Inc.
Innovative products and services for your healthcare facility
888.263.3423 (888-2-OFFICE)
My Account Technology Furniture Ink & Toner Paper Office Supplies
From furniture and technology to cleaning, breakroom and print services, Office Depot is dedicated to providing customized solutions for your healthcare facility. The Healing Space, the Office Depot Healthcare eJournal, will help you stay on the pulse of productivity with efficiency-enhancing innovations.
Explore it now to learn:
• How adaptive furniture can meet a wide range of patient and family needs • New uses for common disinfecting products • High-tech ways to entertain and empower patients
Contact me today to learn more about how our products and services can impact your healthcare facility. {!Account.OwnerFullName} {!Account.OwnerEmail} {!Account.OwnerPhone}
©2016 Office Depot. All rights reserved. 6600 North Military Trail, Boca Raton, FL 33496 To ensure delivery to your inbox, please add officedepot@e.business.officedepot.com to your safe sender list or address book. For compliance with select California laws and for financial reporting purposes, all sales shipped to California and Texas customers are made by eDepot, LLC, a wholly owned subsidiary of Office Depot, Inc., and are FOB destination point.
Have questions? Contact us online or call 888-2-OFFICE (888.263.3423) Privacy Policy
